idea:
We are paper bag/pouch manufacture based at Badlapur,Theshil-Ambernath,Dist-Thane. We are in manufacturing since Jan'19. We manufacture wide range of paper pouches starting from 4'' to 14'' with gusset and without guseet. we also manufacture paper bags, which are mainly used by shops like saree shop,cake shop,etc.

We have 2 employee at our plant who take care of manufacturing and we provide jobs for more than 8 ladies in near by location like handle pasting,side pasting and all.
name: TISSA PAPER PRODUCTS

idea: NTBRC is India's first stand-alone tissue bank that focuses on making available locally sourced quality allografts for Indian patients bringing medical costs down while ensuring quality control. The research arm is focused on furthering medical research as it pertains specifically to the field of tissue banking.
name: Novo Tissue Bank & research Centre

idea:
We are operating in the field of providing total solutions in the field of Interior / Architecture for residential and commercial places.

We are using digitisation to structure this unorganised sector right from designing need of the client to producing customised furniture for their place.

Hence we offer end to end solution from design to execution of the projects.
name: KAIZEN INNOVE INTERIOR SOLUTIONS LLP

idea: Relove is a technology platform that enables websites to deploy a resale solution on their own website. Past customers of the brand can visit the relove section and sell the items they are no longer using to other customers. Relove leverages technology to facilitate the entire transaction by providing verification, packaging, logistics and customer support
name: BAHAAL TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
